content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER, warning: [not receiving electricity]).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with warning [out of fuel]; holds approximately 190 units of water at ~15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) with steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); now associated with fluid_system [78630].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) (status: WORKING) delivering water; associated with fluid_system [78630].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 78630 (status: WORKING); pipes include positions such as (-5.5, 19.5), (-8.5, 21.5), (-6.5, 20.5), and others.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 78629 (status: EMPTY); pipes include positions such as (-2.5, 19.5), (-2.5, 20.5), (-3.5, 20.5), and others.
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 78642 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 78641 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 78637 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 78646 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 78645 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 78648 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 78649 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 78650 (status: EMPTY); pipes include its designated positions.
- Note: Multiple connection attempts targeting candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [77966, 78050, 78132, 78216, 78298, 78382, 78464, 78548] were executed and aborted, leading to the current updated pipeline network.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection Candidate Mismatch:
  - Ensure candidate pipe groups exist within the specified radius and are associated with the correct fluid_system identifier before attempting to connect the steam engine.
  - Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers [77302, 77386, 77468, 77552, 77634, 77718, 77800, 77884] (from earlier steps) and [77966, 78050, 78132, 78216, 78298, 78382, 78464, 78548] (from current steps) failed.
  - Adjust placement of pipe groups or update fluid_system assignments to secure valid connections.
